Tbills using cash averages around 3.6-3.7. You can choose a competitive bidding to indicate the interest rate that you wish to get but it may not be a 100% allocation depending on the rate you indicate

US you should be getting at least 5% for short dated

I have no idea how to link the PayNow to my Credit Card (not sure if can) or how else I can make the payment while earning points at the same time.Anyone able to assist? 😬

I’ve never used the Citi PayAll function before  so not exactly sure how it works. Does it allow for bank transfers? If so  will we still be able to earn the miles?

Yes  can do bank transfers. 2.6% fee for 1.6mpd (current promo now) Min spend 5khttps://www.citibank.com.sg/pdf/credit-cards/other-services/payall/tax-season-promotion-terms-and-conditions.pdf?icid=SGVDINTENHOMECAIM01
Ahh i see. 2.6% fee seems a little steep. However  will consider this. Thank you so much for the assistance! 🫡
